title: Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site   5 Photos  Our Park          Summer Solstice Sunset Community Photography Workshop -  June 21, 2013   5 Photos  Participants learned why the Summer Solstice is the perfect time to photograph the Shawangunk and Catskill mountains. They also gained insight into making compelling artistic landscape images and the many ways to approach landscape photography.          Spring 2013 Photography Conference - May 18, 2013   9 Photos  Attendees of our Community Photography Workshops are encouraged to submit and share some of their photos.  Thank you to all the participants.            Autumn Landscape Photography Conference - September 29, 2012   5 Photos  "Tips On Outdoor Photography" presentation by Photographer Tom Doyle and "Get It Right In The Camera" by Photographer Fred Aquilino.          Community Photography Workshop - April 21, 2012   12 Photos  Beauty Within - A Journey of Landscape Photography presented by: Photographer Robert Rodriguez Jr. Landscapes and Interiors - An exhibit of the National Historic Sites presented by Professor Curtice Taylor and photography students from the New York School of Visual Arts.          Community Photography Workshop - October 29, 2011   6 Photos  Community Photography Workshop - October 29, 2011
